answers.answer: Yes! Lol sorry but it is awful. :( Make sure you drink it super cold, it's easier to get down. Good luck
Aw no lol. Aw but thanks girl :]
Your welcome :) the other thing I will say is try to have several hours clear and free after the test. The sudden sugar overload and following crash can make you really shaky and drowsy.
I didn't find it bad at all, for me it tastes like lime solo if you have had that. Drinking it cold makes it easier to go down, but is only a little bottle anyway.
Its not that bad. Just chug it, its like super sweet soda.
Mine Tasted Like Really Stale 7 Up. Make Sure You  Don't Eat Anything Before And During Your Test
I have mine in Friday I don't have to fast but they say nothing sweet not even fruit
Mine was orange and really really cold. It tasted like powerade, so I was worried for nothing. It was only like 6-8 oz and I had 5mins to drink it.
It wasnt too bad, it tasted like sugar free soda

I had mine last week and tried the lemon lime....I liked it. Weird, huh? The nurse told me I had to chug though :(Tastes like sprite when it comes from the tap with too much syrup and not enough of the CO2. No food restrictions, except during the hour wait and everything was good. If you dont mind sweets, you'll be just fine.
Mine was orange flavor, and I chugged it cause it tasted so Good to me, but I like sugary drinks especially in the morning. I crave my sugar alot lol

question: Just have a question. On Wednesday I have to take the gestational diabetes test. I have to drink a lemon Lime liquid. So I'm wondering if it's nasty??? :(
title: Gestational Diabetes ( think i spelt it wrong )
